overview: Kristina knows where to find them… In her chauffeur-driven limo she takes herself to the port to pick up three beautiful girls for a sex-filled evening. And Bellanova fans know what kind of girls we mean. They fuck in the hotel, in the bathroom, in a sexshop in two’s, three’s and fours. They masturbate each other with massive dildo’s and fists and even piss to their heart delight. Another quality film with a lot of (lesbian) action, a lot of sperm shots and plenty blowjobs by Kristina!
title: Glasnost WIth Love
